lexUnit.name: cut.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: make an opening, incision, or wound in (something) with a sharp tool or object.

sentence.text: His two attackers threatened to cut off the former Manchester United and Chelsea midfielder 's private parts during the vicious revenge attack in a country lane .
They scalped old men and women , beheaded others , slit throats , cut out tongues , sliced off ears , and hacked off limbs .
I remember he was fascinated about the Nilson murders , the man who cut up bodies and melted them down in his garden . "
Then you had a a squad of men pulling them out and cutting them .
She would cut off her right arm and give it to him if he came over with as much as a single bag .
The first , and by far the largest group , is made up of those who cut their wrists and arms .
And a king who hanged hostages for revenge or cut off men 's arms to ` keep the peace " did not seem ` kind " to her .
In the Tutbury custom the bull had his horns , ears and tail cut off , his body smeared with soap and his nose blown full of pepper .
His death was accidental , but the police would never believe that , and so they came to their terrible decision , to cut the body up and hide it .
I know I took a saw with the idea of cutting his head off so that the body could n't be identified .
The Old Bailey heard he then cut her up before taking parts of her body on the Underground system to be dumped outside a women 's refuge .
Secondly , why did Sir Ralph just lie there and allow his throat to be cut so savagely that his head was almost hacked from his body ?
One 3OOkg false killer whale , after hours of being teased and tortured , had its throat cut and bled to death on the dock .
Should I cut off his fingers for daring to draw blood from your precious wife ? "
Later , while living with a woman who had given birth to a child , one of them cut off its hand , probably to use as a Hand of Glory .
What species of idiot , he wondered , had found it fun to murder them , cut off their heads and use them instead of wallpaper ?
This they failed to do and to end the sorry spectacle an order came that the executioner should cut his head off .
` If somebody does n't do something quickly , " said the Queen , ` I 'll cut everybody 's head off . "
Why , King Henry the Eighth might have cut off your head had you not burped your appreciation . "
He had cut off the girl 's head and put it next to her father 's on the garden path , where they had been found by a neighbour .
Mr Leonard , who lives in central Darlington , said : ` I was cut on the head and pushed to the floor several times .
He told Norwich Crown Court he became so de-pressed that he went to the girl 's Felixstowe home , cut himself with a knife and rubbed poison into the wound in a suicide bid .
` They are going to cut someone 's leg off and then pour some hot oil on a bird . "
He could only hope that his Chelonian captors were n't engaged in fiendish torture or had n't cut off his legs or anything .
He cut her throat , stabbed her in the stomach and tried to poke out her eyes with his fingers .
I 'd cut my throat rather than do it again …
I 'd seen a photograph of one of those ; they cut your throat and pull your tongue out through the slit .
They murdered a woman , cut her throat , after they brutally sliced her breasts , raped and burnt her over a fire ! "
` I thought it was all straightforward , with Moslems cutting Copts " throats , as they have always done , and Copts cutting Moslems ' throats , as usual .
In the end Wormtongue is fed up with being beaten so he cuts Saruman 's throat to free himself .
The typical self-cutter has been described as a young , single , attractive female who repeatedly cuts her wrist or forearm .
Although most patients who cut their wrists have experienced psychiatric symptoms , they do not fit into any one category of psychiatric diagnosis .
A few days short of his fifteenth birthday , Gert attempted suicide , cutting his wrist and jumping from a third-floor window .
All women do things to themselves like that here ; cut their wrists , scratch their faces .
A hatchet murder a few days ago : a man named Abbot chopped up a wealthy landowner , his wife and his two women staff , then he cut his own wrists .
Her resolution tightening to match , so that they would have to cut her wrists , she thought , to make her let go .
Or had she cut her wrists in a paroxysm of guilt ?
“ Gorevan then threatened to cut off Thomas 's ear , his penis , and break his legs , ” said Miss Dowell .
This might be useful for the psychiatric inpatient who cuts repeatedly , although the limits of therapist-patient contact would have to be very clear .
` And you 've not had your throat cut yet , " growled Michael .
